title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VIII, subch. A, pt. 2502 - Adjustments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VIII, subch. A, pt. 2502 - Adjustments

State Regulations
§ 2502.1 - Legal regulated rents
§ 2502.2 - Effective date of adjustment of rents
§ 2502.3 - Application for adjustment of initial legal regulated rent
§ 2502.4 - Adjustment of legal regulated rent
§ 2502.5 - Lease agreements
§ 2502.6 - Orders where the legal regulated rent or other facts are in dispute, in doubt, or not known, or where the legal regulated rent must be fixed
§ 2502.7 - Rent adjustments upon vacancy or succession
§ 2502.8 - Surcharge for the installation and use of washing machines, dryers and dishwashers
§ 2502.9 - Surcharges for submetered electricity or other utility service
§ 2502.10 - Schedule

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VIII, subch. A, pt. 2502

Statutory authority: Emergency Tenant Protection Act of
1974, L. 1974, ch. 576;L. 1983, ch. 403

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
